Foundational Account Registration and Login Account Summary Dashboard Account Lookup Online Bill Pay Enrollment (e-Bill and Autopay) Budget Billing View Bill and Payment History Customer Communication (NIPSCO Alerts) Electric Outages Guest Pay

description: MOLA (Monitoring Orchestration Listening Architecture) is a billing web service. MOLA gets requests via MQ for providing billing details. MOLA interacts with different applications like ENSEMBLE and CPT DB to retrieve data and sends data back to the requested applications though another MQ channel.
skills: Java, IBM MQ, Apache Camel, Spring Boot, Web Services, Maven, Rally, Dimensions

description: Banking score card is a metric based analysis for banks to provide score cards. Score cards are based on PL (Problem Loans / Gross Loans), TCE (Tangible Common Equity), NI (Net Income), MA (Market Funds), and LA (Liquid Assets). Score card approach incorporates and builds upon analyst research, experience of the recent financial crisis, and academic literature.
skills: Java, Java EE, spring, Web Services, DB2, UNIX, Jboss EAP 6.4, SVN

projects.project: SDP QOA (Service Delivery Platform – Quoting and Ordering application) (JUN-2014 – JUL-2015)
description: QOA or Quoting and Ordering is a component of the larger Service Delivery Platform - Quote to Order (SDP -Q2O) program. The SDP-Q2O is a distributed architecture/framework used for various Qwest product Sales and Order Processing. QOA modules mission is to automate the order processing, reduce the manual intervention by Sales Representatives by automating data flow between dependent systems. It interfaces with Company Profile, Opportunity, Contract Manager, Workflow and Order Entry System (OES) applications to achieve this objective. QOA is used by sales representatives. It permits the sales staff to adjust out-of-region account structures in response to contracted sales activity and prepare the foundation for ordering flow-through. New quotes can be generated, quotes can be converted once approved by the users, then all the necessary production related information can be collected , verified and delegated to the provisioning systems for circuits/service creation.
skills: Java, JavaScript, Shell scripts, PL/SQL, HTML,TSL, Web Logic, Build Forge, Dimensions, Remedy

description: OMWF is one of the key provisioning application for Century Link which takes cares of activating and deactivation of VoIP Numbers for different kinds of products Integrated Access, Hosted VoIP and Network supporting different Protocols like SIP, MGCP and SIP Trunking and providing emergency 911 service for the customers.
skills: Oracle SQL and PL/SQL, UNIX, Toad, PL/SQL Developer, Altoona XML Spy, Remedy, Dimensions

projects.project: VoIP Task List generation application (OCT-2011 – May-2014)
description: VoIP Task List generation tool is a Java based application which captures the VoIP orders that are generated in 24 hours from VoIP Data base and assigns them to General Shift persons in the VoIP project. This application provides a GUI for all shifts folks to complete the work assign to them.
skills: Java, JSP and Servlet, HTML, JavaScript, Eclipse, Apache Tomcat, PL/SQL, Maven, Dimensions
